original_text: The Lord Almighty promises this: ‘It will happen exactly as I have decided. Yes, it will really happen like that. The Lord Almighty promises this: ‘It will happen exactly as I have decided. Yes, it will really happen like that. The Lord Almighty promises this: ‘It will happen exactly as I have decided. Yes, it will really happen like that. The Lord Almighty promises this: ‘It will happen exactly as I have decided. Yes, it will really happen like that.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 맹세하여 이르시되 내가 생각한 것이 반드시 되며 내가 경영한 것을 반드시 이루리라

sentences.original_text: It will happen exactly as I have decided.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 결정한 대로 정확히 일어날 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Yes, it will really happen like that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇다, 그것은 정말 그렇게 일어날 것이다.
